Package agh.alleviation.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.service.UserService
@Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
Service responsible for manipulating the user repository.
Author:
Anna Nosek
See Also:
User, UserRepository

    • UserService

      @Autowired public UserService​(UserRepository userRepository, CustomerRepository customerRepository)
      Instantiates a new User service.

      userRepository - the user repository
      customerRepository - the customer repository

  • Method Details

    • setUserType

      private User setUserType​(User user)
      This function updates the userType in the user according to its concrete class. UserType would be obsolete in the database, so it is only assigned when the User instance is accessed in the application.
      Parameters:
      user - user from the database
      Returns:
      user with updated UserType field
      See Also:
      User

    • addUser

      Add user user.
      Parameters:
      name - the name
      login - the login
      email - the email
      type - the type
      Returns:
      the user
